wince.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to suddenly change the expression on your face as a reaction to something painful or upsetting
wince.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Sandra winced as the dentist started to drill.
wince.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to suddenly feel very uncomfortable or embarrassed because of something that happens, something you remember etc
wince.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I still wince at the thought of that terrible evening.
